talents.desc: Collecting Regeneration Globes permanently increases Health Regeneration by 1.5 per second.
talents.name: Regeneration Master

talents.desc: Every 10 seconds, your next Basic Attack deals 75% additional damage.  Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.
talents.name: Focused Attack

talents.desc: After using an ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.
talents.name: Follow Through

talents.desc: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, making allies and enemies invulnerable and unable to act for 5 seconds. You are not affected.
talents.name: Void Prison

talents.desc: For 3 seconds, you can activate Blink again to return to the point where it was cast from.
talents.name: Wormhole

talents.desc: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds.
talents.name: Stoneskin

talents.desc: Basic attacks deal 20% more damage and slow the target for 1 second.
talents.name: Nexus Blades
